mapper.select: SELECT c.*, ci.id AS city_id, ci.name AS city_name, a.id AS address_id, a.name AS address_name, tc.id AS tax_condition_id, tc.description AS condition_name FROM client c LEFT JOIN city ci ON ci.id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN address a ON a.id = c.address_id LEFT JOIN tax_condition tc ON tc.id = c.tax_condition_id WHERE c.id = #{id}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO client (full_name, city_id, address_id, address_number, tax_condition_id, document_type, document_number, phone, mobile, email, active, created_at) VALUES (#{fullName}, #{city.id}, #{address.id}, #{addressNumber}, #{taxCondition.id}, #{documentType}, #{documentNumber}, #{phone}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{active}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE client SET full_name = #{fullName}, city_id = #{city.id}, address_id = #{address.id}, address_number = #{addressNumber}, tax_condition_id = #{taxCondition.id}, document_type = #{documentType}, document_number = #{documentNumber}, phone = #{phone}, mobile = #{mobile}, email = #{email}, active = #{active}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
